sentence.Network_en: He was stuck in a line of slow-moving traffic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他陷在缓缓移动的车流里了。

sentence.Network_en: The streets were jammed with slow moving traffic, army convoys moving north-east.
sentence.Network_cn: 军车队向东北方向行驶，致使街道上车流缓慢，交通拥挤。

sentence.Network_en: He dipped his headlights as they came up behind a slow-moving van.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他们靠近一辆缓慢行驶的货车时，他把汽车前灯调成了近光。
